description: Jump into endless fights in this arcade game. You have just one job: Survive as long as you can and beat your score over and over. The enemies are stronger with each wave so your journey to great score would not be easy.

name: Little Packaging Crew
description: Little Packaging Crew is a casual strategy controller-supported game. Join fellow packaging workers to deliver the max number of packages before the end of each work day. Protect your crew workstations against thieves and giants. Provide food and drinks to keep your crew productive and happy.

name: Thread Fred
description: Thread Fred-Side-Scroller Shooter, under your control is a flying man, you Dodge obstacles from above and below, maneuver between lightning strikes, destroy tangles of threads of evil vegetables and collect bonuses in the form of bread crusts.

name: Remalmok
description: Remalmok- is a first person horror game.

name: Tyrannis
description: Tyrannis is an asymmetric, turn-based strategy game that pits overstretched armies of mercenaries against small rebel groups across an American dystopia.

name: Tavern of Gods
description: "Tavern of Gods" is a roguelite auto battle game. Players collect heroes, skills, followers, and equipment to form various builds to fight with random monsters. Every expedition can get new items, and then you can experience more different builds next time.

name: Tezz
description: Tezz is a block-fit puzzle.

name: Haters
description: Dive into the stylized world of HATERS to release hate into other players with third-person shooter combat. Unlock hate weapons get back those players that buy skins. Enjoy 4 different modes alone or with friends. Download for free today and build your hate.

name: Bellatia
description: Bellatia is a hack 'n' slash action role-playing game about warriors fighting over the ultimate godly weapon called the 'Bellatia' in the land of Aslan.

name: Exoblast
description: Exoblast is a shoot'em up arcade game, pimped with synthwave music and pixel art. Choose your pilot, your ship and join the arena to confront other players in nervous and punitive matches. Impose your gameplay and reach the top of the tower!

name: Undergrowth: VR Maze
description: In this VR simulator, you can explore the sandbox with your Steam Index, HTC Vive, or Oculus Headsets and interact with certain parts of the environment. Jump and just be inside the simulator. Relax and enjoy yourself in the green environment.

name: Planet Rescue: Wildlife Vet
description:
Planet Rescue is a range of games focusing on environment issues. While children play, they also learn about endangered animals, pollution, and what can be done to help improve our behaviours. In Planet Rescue: Wildlife Vet, you have a great opportunity to join the most prestigious NGO vet clinic in the world. Choose the vet you want to be, male or female, pass the test period and start your permanent new job position in this environmental organisation. Besides managing your own clinic, you will tour the world to rescue, heal and take care of wild animals. Most of them are endangered species like the Sea Turtle, Florida Panther, Giraffe or the China Panda Bear for instance.

More than 30 missions around the world, to heal endangered exotic animals, or to treat the animals directly in the clinic.
Depending on the weather and the place, choose the right outfits to perform the treatment in the best conditions.
Use the Wii Remote to perform realistic actions: rescue, diagnose and treat a variety of different species - adult and baby animals such as Florida Panther, Giraffe, China Panda Bear, Zebra, Kangaroos, India Elephant...
Take care of your own pet: a cute baby tiger! Feed and clean it, play with it, and make sure it stays healthy!

name: The Doomed Knight
description: This metrodvania inspired game lets you discover an fascinating world full of monsters, secrets and mysteries.

name: Ordeal
description: Ordeal is a third-person shooter with a WWII setting and a Low Poly style.

name: Ruin Hunters
description: Take command of your heroes in this turn-based tactical game. Wander into the deep of the dungeons, defeat enemies, gather treasures, while your party grows in power.

name: Dimension Rift Zero
description: Explore an interconnected world, encounter bizarre enemies and mysterious puzzles in this hand-drawn metroidvania, action adventure. Forge your own path, uncover secrets and master unique powers.

name: The Adventures of Maximus
description: With the events that lead to the death of Maximus's wife, you embark on an adventure to avenge her death. Fight your way to uncover the mastermind who is responsible for the death of Maximu's wife.

name: Light For Plants
description: Light for Plants is a physics-based puzzle game in which you must direct and manipulate a light beam to reach the plants and save them from the endless darkness.

name: Retrowave Road
description: Welcome back to the 80s! Retrowave Road is an action-arcade game about dodging obstacles at full speed and collecting various pickups. Pixels, synthwave, palm trees and an endless highway...

name: Spider-Man 2: The Game
description:
"Spider-Man 2" for PC and Mac is an almost completely different game than its console counterpart. This is not a port from the console version, but a different version developed by The Fizz Factor and published by Activision.

As Spider-Man you must battle out through 8 chapters of mischief and mayhem to succeed. Along the way you will encounter and have to battle old foes like Rhino, Mysterio, Puma, Doc Ock and more. The game interface consists of a simple point and click system coupled with keyboard movement. Unlike it's console counterpart there is no free swinging movement but one designed with kids in mind.

Fighting consists of basic punching, kicking, jumpkicks and a power meter that let's you do a supercharged attack. 'Spidey' can also zip to walls and objects and use his web to do basic attacks on enemies.

name: Pandemic Violence
description: Beat down citizens taken their gold, kill your neighbors for a roll of toilet paper, and plenty more scenarios like that.

name: Kingdom of Kuru: The Great Race
description: Both a platformer and an action racing game, Kingdom of Kuru pits you against both other players and monsters to race through levels using your powers to hinder your rivals and get to the end first.

name: Mon Coach Personnel, J'enrichis Mon Vocabulaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Le Monde de Titeuf
description: Share the life of the little playground rebel Titeuf, surrounded by his whole gang of friends in Le Monde de Titeuf on DS! Playing basketball, caricaturing the teacher, annoying the girls, all that is not for the faint of heart! Also take part in some ecological activities by sorting waste or erasing tags.

name: Le Monde de Nadia
description: In Le Monde de Nadia on DS, discover the world of the rebellious hero Titeuf, but on the feminine side! Share Nadia's life like in the comic strip and go scootering, skipping rope, shopping... Also participate in ecological activities like erasing tags or collecting and sorting waste.

name: Eindeloos Mahjong
description: Sin descripción

name: Mission Veterinaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Kira-meki Oshare Salon!: Watashi no Shigoto wa Biyoushi-san
description: Sin descripción

name: SNK Fighting Legends
description: Sin descripción

name: Technōs Arcade I
description:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Technos Arcade I collection includes the following titles:

- The Combatribes
- Block Out
- Battle Lane Vol. 5
- Double Dragon II: The Revenge
- Double Dragon III: The Rosetta Stone
- Mania Challenge
- Minky Monkey
- Mysterious Stones: Dr John's Adventure

name: Doog
description: This game emulates the classic Doom experience (to an extent) with a Hololive theme.

name: Swordswallower
description: Swordswallower is a psych-goth action platformer where players traverse and fight only by throwing their massive enchanted sword. The player can’t jump, instead launching their sword into the environment and pulling themselves toward it with tremendous force.

name: Jigsaw
description: A Flash-based jigsaw puzzle game featured on Gaia Online.

name: Data East Arcade 1
description:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Data East Arcade 1 collection includes the following titles:

- Bad Dudes Vs Dragon Ninja (released as Bad Dudes in North America)
- Breakthru
- Burger Time
- Chain Reaction (released as Magical Drop Plus 1! in Japan)
- Dark Seal (released as Gate of Doom in North America)
- Darwin 4078
- Lock 'n' Chase
- Sly Spy (released as Sly Spy: Secret Agent in Europe)
- TumblePop
- Wizard Fire (released as Dark Seal II in Japan)

name: Gaelco Arcade 1
description:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Gaelco Arcade 1 collection includes the following titles:

- Alligator Hunt
- Biomechanical Toy
- Glass
- Snow Board Championship
- Thunder Hoop
- World Rally

name: Alley Catz Bowling
description: Alley Catz Bowling Was created in 2021 to provide fun to twitch users we are a very simply bowling game that can be controlled by twitch by typing !bowl in chat. Users are able to put a spin on there balls and power to there balls and lot more.

name: Atari Arcade 1
description:
Compatible with both Handheld and VS models, the Atari Arcade 1 collection includes the following titles:

- Asteroids Deluxe
- Canyon Bomber
- Centipede
- Crystal Castles
- Liberator
- Lunar Lander
- Millipede
- Missile Command
- Night Driver
- Pong
- Skydiver
- Super Breakout
- Warlords

name: Influxis
description: A sci-fi underwater survival and exploration game

name: Ready Aim Fire
description: What if you are on an elephant toy battling around in your child-hood toy room? Operate your favorite toy tank mechanically but easily to explore through the cartoon-styled world. Search for the targets, and Ready, Aim, Fire!

name: No Parachute
description: No Parachute is a fast-paced arcade game with a pixel art style, in which you will dodge various obstacles in free fall. Try to find out what is on the other side of the tunnel, and save your arms and legs along the way!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Charybdis Outpost
description: In this exclusive mission, unravel the secrets of the Charybdis holding centre as you make your way through unique environments and experience brutal combat against an unknown enemy.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Desperate Crusade
description: An Imperial ship transporting an Ecclesiarchy relic has crash landed on a world overrun by Chaos. The Caligari Conclave is under grave pressure to assist in the recovery of the priceless artifact. Will you answer the call?

name: Nature Matters
description: Set off on a puzzle-filled journey to save the planet and experience a compelling tale of friendship, sacrifice and redemption. In "Nature Matters" you take on a role of a little plant spirit. Without protection, surrounded by a city that grows up from everywhere, one day she realizes that she is completely alone and won't be able to survive. The only solution is to find her caretaker - a little boy who has been caught up in a whirlwind of human weakness and convince him to take care of her again. During your journey, you will see different lands devastated by the destructive human influence. Solving the puzzles, with the sounds of relaxing music, you will have the opportunity to restore vegetation and colors in them. The unique graphic design will allow you to immerse yourself in a world that will remain in your memory for a long time. The "Nature Matters" project is a small contribution that the studio "Digital Melody" wants to make towards arousing social awareness of the threats that result from human neglect of the natural environment. As the creators say, if at least one person becomes more attentive to nature by experiencing this game, it will be a great joy for us. Game features: - logic puzzles - atmospheric music - elegant graphics - stirring story

name: Lu Tu
description: This is a Parkour game.

name: Grand Slam Tennis
description: Play the 4 Grand Slam Tournaments in this higly realistic tennis game. Play solo or against friends and family in the local multiplayer split screen mode. Tons of 3D animations and all real tennis ball effects/shots makes Grand Slam Tennis the most playable tennis game on eShop! Main Features: -Full 3D -8 Players including 4 Female Players -lift/slice/volley/smash/lob/passing shots -Easy Joy-Con or Pro Controller controls -Solo or Local Split Screen Multiplayer -Realistic Tennis Sounds -Tournament Mode -Ball Machine Training Mode Win the Grand Slam!

name: Justin Danger
description: Runventure awaits! Jump in to the action and explore mysterious lands in search of treasures. Avoid the danger, run through various locations. Jungles, temples, castles and many other places loaded with deadly traps and hordes of enemies. Use your reflexes to jump over hot lava, or rope swing over piranha pools escape the deadly skeletons and hungry wolves. - Super sharp vector graphics! - Explore mysterious lands with parallax backgrounds. - Tons of characters to unlock and level up - Great levels, obstacles and enemies to beat Build the team of experienced explorers, level them up, complete challenges and unlock precious treasures. Now it’s time for adventure, it’s time for Runventure!

name: Delivery Company Clicker
description: Deliver Company Clicker is a small game with a cozy atmosphere and main goal to unlock every upgrade while listening to a good music

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Mind Plague
description: Inexplicable violence has broken out amongst Imperial subjects, who began to act like possessed madmen. Is this a Chaos ploy? A Xenos interference? Or perhaps a Warp phenomenon? Either way, this is a matter for the Inquisition.

name: Lux: The Journey
description: Explore a beautiful and mysterious world in Lux: The Journey. Seek lost knowledge, craft, build, survive the dark and find your destiny.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Grim Penance
description: An Imperial void station has detected a Chaos flotilla on a collision course. Their numbers seem insufficient to pose a real threat but the Inquisition cannot take any chances when it comes to the the followers of Khorne.

name: Dragon Rising
description: Take you to the mysterious world of giant dragons, where you can breed various types of giant dragons.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Hollow Bliss
description: An Imperial ship with pilgrims on the deck has been quarantined due to a mysterious, Warp-related infection. At first glance this might not concern the Inquisition - however, there are obscure references to this malady in an Ordo case file, but most of the material has been corrupted.

name: Wild Rat
description: Wild Rat - A rhythmic game with a good test of reaction efficiency and speed, dodging flying saws circling the walls and one hated rat, the player must fight off the rat so many times and put a mousetrap that will catch the hated rat.

name: Endless Crawler
description: Endless Crawler is a top down shooter with elements of the Roguelike genre, where the player explores underground levels, destroys hordes of monsters, goes world after world and unlocks improvements that will help him on further adventures.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: City of Suffering
description: Enter the City of Suffering where the Drukhari hunt their human prey on a larger scale. Hinder the Xenos plans, take down as many Pain Catalysts as you can and make them pay for every Imperial citizen they steal.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Poisoned Souls
description: The spread of Warp-tainted drugs has been reported amongst the populace, with potentially grave consequences for the stability of the affected region. The threat level is still debatable, but the Imperium cannot take risks on matters like this.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Faith Undone
description: Another wave of seditionist idea has infected an Imperial world. Fortunately, the agents of the Holy Ordos have discovered the trouble before it could spread too far. There is still time to weed out the ringleaders.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Discordant Choir
description: It has come to our attention that a disturbingly large number of unidentified psykers were found among the denizens of an Imperial world. The Ordo Hereticus has flagged this anomaly as a case of utmost priority.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Maelstrom of Carnage
description: An unfortunate Imperial world has been overrun by Chaos Daemons. Exterminatus is not yet possible, so selfless sacrifice is needed to keep the tide from spiraling out of control. Are you willing to descend amidst the Daemonic hordes and call orbital strikes while you are fighting down there - for the sake of the Imperium of Man?

name: Warhammer 40,000: Inquisitor - Martyr: Forgotten Arsenal
description: An ancient, forgotten Imperial Vault has been rediscovered. Does it contain any valuable artifacts? Important writings? Perhaps codices of vile heresy? It is your job to find out and secure whatever treasure or evil lies within.

name: Respawnables Heroes
description: Respawnables Heroes is a tactical Hero-action game where players team up on thrilling 4vs4 matches and choose different play-styles from a set of heroes. The game has been designed to reward team-cooperation and synergies between Heroes. Thus, the way the components play as wholesome and implement a strategy based on the distinctive heroes' skills, determines the success in the game.

name: Mollycoddle Mayhem
description: Mollycoddle Mayhem is a couch co-op game for up to four players where you work together to spoil and pamper babies that have been anonymously abandoned. Cook, clean, change diapers, and perform various other tasks before the little ones get too upset.

name: Eia
description: A short story in which a boy saves a girl.

name: Battle Guns Simulator
description: Welcome to Battle Guns Simulator with great gameplay, lots of customizations, weapon options and accessories. Start this game and test your skills!!

name: Redd's Runaway
description: Stop the Underworld's hordes of demons and ghouls in this Arcade game, inspired by the Day of the Dead and Halloween.

name: Zero Wrath Vendetta
description: Dodge enemy beams with your space fighter, kill huge bosses, and sing along to seven distinct songs in this unique rock opera videogame.

name: Space Dance Harmony
description: Space Dance Harmony is a VR dance rhythm game where you replicate real dance choreographies with your entire body to play. Immersed in breathtaking environments shaped by the sound and aesthetics of popular dance music, Space Dance Harmony is your space to get free and to dance.

name: Soul Challenge
description: After people died, the soul will go to its destination, or will be punished and reborn. In the game, you will play a lost soul in hell and his girlfriend, and you will face a series of challenges. After completed the series of challenges, you will reach the victory of eternal life.

name: I Have Powers!
description: This is a super heroic super hero arcade fighting game, make a Super hero using the classic 4 color costume design of comic-book Heroes. See how powerful you can make your character, see how long they can survive. Choose lots of different Super Powers, stop crime by any means!

name: Xagonia Colony
description: Terraform, decorate and grow plants to customize your Xagonia Colony. Go on a roguelike adventure to nearby planets and collect special resources for your colony. Invite alien residents to build a diverse town on the cozy planet.

name: Space Trains
description: A light strategy-puzzle game about building an interplanetary industrial rail network. Discover new planets, assign them planet-wide projects, and watch as trains miraculously ferry the fruits of their labor around... through space!

name: Box: Boxing
description: Box: Boxing is a multiplayer virtual reality boxing game with action filled gameplay and unique graphics. Fight against the CPU or others players in the craziest scenarios you've ever seen and become the champion of the Box:Boxing world!

name: Mean-While
description: Two rivaling megalomaniacs are forced to work together in hopes to survive each other's fortresses. Join Skeleman, and his rival, Dr. Dangerous, in the thrilling comedic adventure title: Meanwhile.

name: The Spiral Labyrinth
description: Let's take on the challenge of the Spiral Labyrinth, which changes shape every time you enter! In this roguelike game, you use various items to fight the powerful monsters lurking in the labyrinth.

name: Nerm the Worm
description: Nerm the Worm was developed from the heart with the goal of offering a brand new super fun-to-play snake game with unique twists & new turns! Nerm presents challenging goals, an adorable personality, and fifty grueling levels to progress through! Nerm just wants to escape! ..Can you help him?

name: Crashers of Aetheria
description: Crashers of Aetheria is a strategy card collecting game. Players use Crashers to strategically take out their opponent online or offline.

name: Pancake Sailor
description: Relaxing sailing experience. Discover Akalana Islands.

name: Garden Magic
description: A short match 3 game with unique mechanics.

name: Teke-teke
description: Teke-teke is a first-person horror adventure game based on a Japanese myth. The gameplay focuses on storytelling, stealth and decision making, there are also some puzzles for the player to solve, making gameplay more various.

name: Don't Die! Douche!
description: Charge your way through 5 fever-dream induced worlds, dodging a plethora of bizarre dangers on your way. And remember: Don't Die! Douche!

name: Our America
description: Our America is a branching VR narrative experience that follows a Black father and his son on their way to school.

name: The Fellowship Saga
description: The Fellowship Saga is a party-based RPG, immersing you into the action with a first-person view. Using rules from the 5th edition of the world's most popular RPG system, go on an epic adventure as the party becomes entangled in the very survival of the realm.

name: Pole of Cold
